channel.title: Disgraceful, Perfetic, Annoying

item.title: Disgraceful, Perfetic, Annoying
item.dc:creator: @mrX mrX
item.description:
@mrX wrote:

I’m here to bring up the idea of servers. A private server should be some-what of runescape. I’ve been looking through nowadays sources and they’re horrible. They’re either the same as other sources accept they have different names or they’ve been added a load of jiberish just to make the file look massive and better. The layout of source is also a disgrace for example.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("birh")) { addItem(1561, 1) ; sendMessage("yu gve birh to a bbe"); }

Ok, for a start, the layout. It’s DISGRACEFUL! He can’t even spell!

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Birth")) { addItem(1561, 1) ; sendMessage("You gave birth to a new born baby!"); }

Jesus christ, sort this forum out!

Read full topic
